name: Pick and drop the oblation
description:
This game is a third-person collection game. At the beginning, there are some oblations (blue balls) and obstacles (brown cube) generating randomly on the map. You need to pick the oblations which generated by the wells and drop them near the angel statue to sacrifice the god. The time is limited. So you need to collect enough oblations in the short time to finish the task.

This game is made by Ruoming Lin, 216327678,  DATT3300, Lab 01
